com.heally.healthtrackerapp

Class MainActivity.Stopwatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heally.healthtrackerapp.MainActivity.Stopwatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    MainActivity

    class MainActivity.Stopwatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The stopwatch. A thread implementation for the stopwatch feature. API doc was mixed bag: https://developer.android.com/guide/components/processes-and-threads#WorkerThreads https://stackoverflow.com/a/12937153
